GSD.description:
PM: core: keep irq flags in device_pm_check_callbacks()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit be8bc05f38d667eda1e820bc6f69234795be7809. For more details please see the references link.
